import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { motion } from 'framer-motion' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import swal from 'sweetalert' import { Context } from '../../utils/context' import { PageAnimation } from '../../utils/PageAnimation' const MyProfile = () => { const [state, dispatch] = useContext(Context) logout(); const history = useHistory() const logout = () => { swal({ title:"Are you sure?", text: "You Want To Logout From Speedyfood!!", icon: "warning", buttons: true, dangerMode: true }) .then((willDelete) => { if (willDelete) { swal("Logout Successfully.", { icon: "success" }) dispatch({type:"UNSET_USER"}) history.push('/') } }) } logout(); return (

My Profile

Name :

{state.user.username || 'NA'}

Email :

{state.user.email || 'NA'}

Phone :

{state.user.phone || 'NA'}

 ) } export default MyProfile
